```{r}
data_1a = read.csv("train_s.csv")
mod <- lm(totals.transactionRevenue ~ device.isMobile + date + device.browser + device.operatingSystem + device.deviceCategory + geoNetwork.continent + geoNetwork.subContinent +
            geoNetwork.country + totals.hits + totals.pageviews + trafficSource.source + trafficSource.adContent, data = data_1a)
mod2 <- step(mod, direction = "both", steps = 100000)
```
